  • Method Details

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns False if this validation result contains errors and/or warnings.

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty(ValidationLevel level)
      Returns true if this validation result contains errors and/or warnings relative to the specified validation level.
      Parameters:
      level - the validation level to check
      Returns:
      False if the ValidationResults contains any errors, either global or on any fields, relative to the specified error level. If the specified level is null, all errors are significant.

    • hasErrors

      boolean hasErrors()
      Returns:
      True if the ValidationResults contains any errors, either global or on any fields, regardless of error level.

    • getErrors

      List getErrors()
      Returns list of all errors, either global or on any fields, in the ValidationResult, regardless of level
      Returns:
      List of errors, may be empty but is never null

    • hasErrors

      boolean hasErrors(ValidationLevel level)
      Returns whether or not errors exist in this validation result at the given level
      Parameters:
      level - the level to check or null
      Returns:
      True if the ValidationResults contains any errors, either global or on any fields, relative to the specified error level. If the specified level is null, all errors are significant.

    • getErrors

      List getErrors(ValidationLevel level)
      Returns list of all errors, either global or on any fields, above the given level in the ValidationResult
      Parameters:
      level - the level to check or null. If null then all errors are returned
      Returns:
      List of errors, may be empty but is never null

    • hasWarnings

      boolean hasWarnings()
      Returns:
      True if the ValidationResults contains any warnings, either global or on any fields, regardless of error level.

    • getWarnings

      List getWarnings()
      Returns list of all warnings, either global or on any fields, in the ValidationResult, regardless of level
      Returns:
      List of warnings, may be empty but is never null

    • hasWarnings

      boolean hasWarnings(ValidationLevel level)
      Returns whether or not warnings exist in this validation result.
      Parameters:
      level - the level to check or null
      Returns:
      True if the ValidationResults contains any warnings, either global or on any fields, relative to the specified warning level. If the specified level is null, all warnings are significant.

    • getWarnings

      List getWarnings(ValidationLevel level)
      Returns list of all warnings, either global or on any fields, above the given level in the ValidationResult
      Parameters:
      level - the level to check or null. If null then all warnings are returned
      Returns:
      List of warnings, may be empty but is never null

    • getErrorMessages

      String[] getErrorMessages()

    • getErrorMessages

      String[] getErrorMessages(ValidationLevel level)

    • filterIssues

      List filterIssues(ValidationIssueFilter filter)
      Returns a list of issues that pass the given filter. This is a
      Parameters:
      filter - the filter to use, must not be null
      Returns:
      the list of general and field validations that pass the filter. May return an empty list, never returns null
